#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, n, m, k;
    int arr[50][50];
    vector<int> v;

    cin >> t;

    while (t--) {
        char c;
        int count = 0, ans = 0;
        string s;

        cin >> n >> m >> k;

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            cin >> s;
            for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
                if (s[j] == '*') {
                    count++;
                }
            }
            v.push_back(count);
            count = 0;
        }


        while (k--) {
            sort(v.begin(), v.end());
            v[0] = m - v[0];
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            ans = ans + v[i];
        }

        cout << ans << endl;
        v.clear();
    }
    
    return 0;
}
